statements.statement: SELECT CLASS_CD, CLASS_NM FROM TM_PW_TRC_CLASS_GROUP WHERE PRODUCT_KIND_CD = #PRODUCT_KIND_CD# AND GROUP_CD = #GROUP_CD# AND DISPLAY_ORDER > 0 ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER
SELECT PRODUCT_KIND_CD, GROUP_CD, CLASS_CD, CLASS_NM, DISPLAY_ORDER FROM TM_PW_TRC_CLASS_GROUP WHERE DISPLAY_ORDER > 0 ORDER BY PRODUCT_KIND_CD, GROUP_CD, CLASS_CD, DISPLAY_ORDER
